house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1994 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Success Realty Coldwell Banker Success Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Loft, Microwave
